HiddenText.Name: What can I do with the degree if I do not certify or accredit as a professional genealogist?
HiddenText.OpenningText: What can I do with the degree if I do not certify or accredit as a professional genealogist?
HiddenText.BodyCopy:
The skills that students learn in this program can be applied as they conduct family history research with their extended families and as they help others in their local church units.

Students who complete the degree will gain research methodology skills they can use in doing basic genealogical research for clients.  If they later choose to pursue professional certification or accreditation, the skills they learn in the coursework will provide a solid foundation upon which they can build.
